      4629 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4630 +        // PHASE 9: LIQUID REALITY SCROLL (LENIS)            
      4631 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4632 +        let lenis = null;                                    
      4633 +                                                             
      4634 +        const enableLiquidScroll =                           
           +!window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion:                 
           +reduce)').matches;                                           
      4635 +                                                             
      4636 +        if (enableLiquidScroll && typeof Lenis !==           
           +'undefined') {                                               
      4637 +            lenis = new Lenis({                              
      4638 +                duration: 1.4,                               
      4639 +                easing: (t) => Math.min(1, 1.001 -           
           +Math.pow(2, -10 * t)),                                       
      4640 +                orientation: 'vertical',                     
      4641 +                gestureOrientation: 'vertical',              
      4642 +                smoothWheel: true,                           
      4643 +                wheelMultiplier: 0.8,                        
      4644 +                smoothTouch: false,                          
      4645 +                touchMultiplier: 1.5,                        
      4646 +                infinite: false,                             
      4647 +            });                                              
      4648 +                                                             
      4649 +            function lenisRaf(time) {                        
      4650 +                lenis.raf(time);                             
      4651 +                requestAnimationFrame(lenisRaf);             
      4652 +            }                                                
      4653 +            requestAnimationFrame(lenisRaf);                 
      4654 +                                                             
      4655 +            lenis.on('scroll', ({ scroll, progress }) => {   
      4656 +                                                             
           +document.documentElement.style.setProperty('--scroll-y',     
           +scroll);                                                     
      4657 +                document.documentElement.style.setProperty(' 
           +--scroll-progress', progress);                               
      4658 +            });                                              
      4659 +                                                             
      4660 +            lenis.on('scroll', ({ scroll }) => {             
      4661 +                                                             
           +document.querySelectorAll('[data-parallax]').forEach(el => { 
      4662 +                    const speed =                            
           +parseFloat(el.dataset.parallax) || 0.5;                      
      4663 +                    const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect(); 
      4664 +                    const yOffset = (rect.top + scroll) *    
           +speed * -0.1;                                                
      4665 +                    el.style.transform =                     
           +`translateY(${yOffset}px)`;                                  
      4666 +                });                                          
      4667 +            });                                              
      4668 +                                                             
      4669 +            console.log('âœ¨ Liquid Reality scroll enabled');  
      4670 +        }                                                    
      4671 +                                                             
      4672 +        // Scroll-triggered reveals                          
      4673 +        const liquidRevealObserver = new                     
           +IntersectionObserver((entries) => {                          
      4674 +            entries.forEach(entry => {                       
      4675 +                if (entry.isIntersecting) {                  
      4676 +                    entry.target.classList.add('in-view');   
      4677 +                }                                            
      4678 +            });                                              
      4679 +        }, { threshold: 0.15, rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px     
           +0px' });                                                     
      4680 +                                                             
      4681 +        document.querySelectorAll('.idea-card,               
           +.quote-card').forEach(el => {                                
      4682 +            el.classList.add('liquid-reveal');               
      4683 +            liquidRevealObserver.observe(el);                
      4684 +        });                                                  
      4685 +                                                             
      4686 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4687 +        // PHASE 8: CINEMATIC VIDEO PORTAL                   
      4688 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4689 +        const videoPortal =                                  
           +document.getElementById('video-portal');                     
      4690 +        const portalVideo =                                  
           +document.getElementById('portal-video');                     
      4691 +                                                             
      4692 +        if (videoPortal && portalVideo) {                    
      4693 +            const videoObserver = new                        
           +IntersectionObserver((entries) => {                          
      4694 +                entries.forEach(entry => {                   
      4695 +                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {              
      4696 +                        portalVideo.load();                  
      4697 +                        portalVideo.play().then(() => {      
      4698 +                                                             
           +videoPortal.classList.add('loaded');                         
      4699 +                        }).catch(e => {                      
      4700 +                            console.log('Video autoplay      
           +prevented:', e);                                             
      4701 +                                                             
           +videoPortal.classList.add('loaded');                         
      4702 +                        });                                  
      4703 +                    } else {                                 
      4704 +                        portalVideo.pause();                 
      4705 +                    }                                        
      4706 +                });                                          
      4707 +            }, {                                             
      4708 +                threshold: 0.1,                              
      4709 +                rootMargin: '100px'                          
      4710 +            });                                              
      4711 +                                                             
      4712 +            videoObserver.observe(videoPortal);              
      4713 +                                                             
      4714 +            if (window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion:  
           +reduce)').matches) {                                         
      4715 +                portalVideo.remove();                        
      4716 +                videoPortal.style.background =               
           +'radial-gradient(ellipse, rgba(212, 168, 75, 0.1) 0%,        
           +transparent 70%)';                                           
      4717 +                videoPortal.classList.add('loaded');         
      4718 +            }                                                
      4719 +                                                             
      4720 +            document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', () 
           + => {                                                        
      4721 +                if (document.hidden) {                       
      4722 +                    portalVideo.pause();                     
      4723 +                } else if                                    
           +(videoPortal.classList.contains('loaded')) {                 
      4724 +                    portalVideo.play().catch(() => {});      
      4725 +                }                                            
      4726 +            });                                              
      4727 +        }                                                    
      4728 +                                                             
      4729 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4730 +        // PHASE 10: SONIC ARCHITECTURE (TONE.JS)            
      4731 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4732 +        const SonicArchitecture = {                          
      4733 +            initialized: false,                              
      4734 +            playing: false,                                  
      4735 +            synths: {},                                      
      4736 +                                                             
      4737 +            async init() {                                   
      4738 +                if (this.initialized || typeof Tone ===      
           +'undefined') return;                                         
      4739 +                                                             
      4740 +                await Tone.start();                          
      4741 +                                                             
      4742 +                this.synths.pad = new                        
           +Tone.PolySynth(Tone.Synth, {                                 
      4743 +                    oscillator: { type: 'sine' },            
      4744 +                    envelope: { attack: 4, decay: 2,         
           +sustain: 0.8, release: 4 }                                   
      4745 +                }).toDestination();                          
      4746 +                this.synths.pad.volume.value = -24;          
      4747 +                                                             
      4748 +                this.synths.shimmer = new Tone.Synth({       
      4749 +                    oscillator: { type: 'triangle' },        
      4750 +                    envelope: { attack: 0.01, decay: 0.3,    
           +sustain: 0, release: 0.5 }                                   
      4751 +                }).toDestination();                          
      4752 +                this.synths.shimmer.volume.value = -18;      
      4753 +                                                             
      4754 +                this.filter = new Tone.Filter(800,           
           +'lowpass').toDestination();                                  
      4755 +                this.synths.pad.connect(this.filter);        
      4756 +                                                             
      4757 +                this.reverb = new Tone.Reverb({ decay: 8,    
           +wet: 0.6 }).toDestination();                                 
      4758 +                this.synths.pad.connect(this.reverb);        
      4759 +                this.synths.shimmer.connect(this.reverb);    
      4760 +                                                             
      4761 +                this.initialized = true;                     
      4762 +                console.log('âœ¨ Sonic Architecture            
           +initialized');                                               
      4763 +            },                                               
      4764 +                                                             
      4765 +            async start() {                                  
      4766 +                if (!this.initialized) await this.init();    
      4767 +                if (this.playing) return;                    
      4768 +                                                             
      4769 +                this.playing = true;                         
      4770 +                                                             
      4771 +                const chords = [                             
      4772 +                    ['A2', 'E3', 'A3'],                      
      4773 +                    ['F2', 'A2', 'C3'],                      
      4774 +                    ['D2', 'F2', 'A2'],                      
      4775 +                    ['E2', 'G#2', 'B2']                      
      4776 +                ];                                           
      4777 +                                                             
      4778 +                let chordIndex = 0;                          
      4779 +                                                             
      4780 +                const playChord = () => {                    
      4781 +                    if (!this.playing) return;               
      4782 +                                                             
      4783 +                                                             
           +this.synths.pad.triggerAttackRelease(chords[chordIndex],     
           +'8n');                                                       
      4784 +                    chordIndex = (chordIndex + 1) %          
           +chords.length;                                               
      4785 +                                                             
      4786 +                    setTimeout(playChord, 8000 +             
           +Math.random() * 4000);                                       
      4787 +                };                                           
      4788 +                                                             
      4789 +                playChord();                                 
      4790 +                                                             
      4791 +                if (lenis) {                                 
      4792 +                    lenis.on('scroll', ({ progress }) => {   
      4793 +                        const freq = 400 + (progress *       
           +1200);                                                       
      4794 +                        this.filter.frequency.rampTo(freq,   
           +0.5);                                                        
      4795 +                    });                                      
      4796 +                }                                            
      4797 +            },                                               
      4798 +                                                             
      4799 +            stop() {                                         
      4800 +                this.playing = false;                        
      4801 +                if (this.synths.pad) {                       
      4802 +                    this.synths.pad.releaseAll();            
      4803 +                }                                            
      4804 +            },                                               
      4805 +                                                             
      4806 +            playInteraction(type = 'click') {                
      4807 +                if (!this.initialized || !this.playing)      
           +return;                                                      
      4808 +                                                             
      4809 +                const notes = {                              
      4810 +                    click: 'C5',                             
      4811 +                    hover: 'E5',                             
      4812 +                    scroll: 'G4',                            
      4813 +                    milestone: ['C5', 'E5', 'G5']            
      4814 +                };                                           
      4815 +                                                             
      4816 +                const note = notes[type] || 'C5';            
      4817 +                                                             
      4818 +                if (Array.isArray(note)) {                   
      4819 +                    note.forEach((n, i) => {                 
      4820 +                        setTimeout(() => {                   
      4821 +                                                             
           +this.synths.shimmer.triggerAttackRelease(n, '16n');          
      4822 +                        }, i * 100);                         
      4823 +                    });                                      
      4824 +                } else {                                     
      4825 +                                                             
           +this.synths.shimmer.triggerAttackRelease(note, '16n');       
      4826 +                }                                            
      4827 +            }                                                
      4828 +        };                                                   
      4829 +                                                             
      4830 +        // Audio toggle button                               
      4831 +        const audioToggle =                                  
           +document.getElementById('audio-toggle');                     
      4832 +        if (audioToggle) {                                   
      4833 +            audioToggle.addEventListener('click', async ()   
           +=> {                                                         
      4834 +                const isActive =                             
           +audioToggle.classList.toggle('active');                      
      4835 +                                                             
      4836 +                if (isActive) {                              
      4837 +                    await SonicArchitecture.start();         
      4838 +                    localStorage.setItem('ia_audio',         
           +'true');                                                     
      4839 +                    const tooltip =                          
           +audioToggle.querySelector('.audio-toggle-tooltip');          
      4840 +                    if (tooltip) tooltip.textContent =       
           +'Sound On';                                                  
      4841 +                } else {                                     
      4842 +                    SonicArchitecture.stop();                
      4843 +                    localStorage.setItem('ia_audio',         
           +'false');                                                    
      4844 +                    const tooltip =                          
           +audioToggle.querySelector('.audio-toggle-tooltip');          
      4845 +                    if (tooltip) tooltip.textContent =       
           +'Enable Ambient Sound';                                      
      4846 +                }                                            
      4847 +            });                                              
      4848 +                                                             
      4849 +            document.querySelectorAll('button, a,            
           +.idea-card, .quote-card').forEach(el => {                    
      4850 +                el.addEventListener('mouseenter', () =>      
           +SonicArchitecture.playInteraction('hover'));                 
      4851 +                el.addEventListener('click', () =>           
           +SonicArchitecture.playInteraction('click'));                 
      4852 +            });                                              
      4853 +        }                                                    
      4854 +                                                             
      4855 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4856 +        // PHASE 11: HOLOGRAPHIC BOOK                        
      4857 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4858 +        const holoBook =                                     
           +document.getElementById('hero-book-3d');                     
      4859 +        const bookShadow =                                   
           +document.getElementById('book-shadow');                      
      4860 +        const bookLight =                                    
           +holoBook?.querySelector('.book-light-layer');                
      4861 +                                                             
      4862 +        if (holoBook) {                                      
      4863 +            const maxRotation = 15;                          
      4864 +                                                             
      4865 +            // Desktop: Mouse tracking                       
      4866 +            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {                   
      4867 +                document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e)   
           +=> {                                                         
      4868 +                    const rect =                             
           +holoBook.getBoundingClientRect();                            
      4869 +                    const centerX = rect.left + rect.width / 
           + 2;                                                          
      4870 +                    const centerY = rect.top + rect.height / 
           + 2;                                                          
      4871 +                                                             
      4872 +                    const rotateY = ((e.clientX - centerX) / 
           + window.innerWidth) * maxRotation * 2;                       
      4873 +                    const rotateX = ((centerY - e.clientY) / 
           + window.innerHeight) * maxRotation * 2;                      
      4874 +                                                             
      4875 +                    holoBook.style.transform =               
           +`rotateY(${rotateY}deg) rotateX(${rotateX}deg)`;             
      4876 +                    holoBook.classList.add('tracking');      
      4877 +                                                             
      4878 +                    if (bookShadow) {                        
      4879 +                        bookShadow.style.transform =         
           +`translateX(calc(-50% + ${rotateY * 2}px)) rotateX(90deg)    
           +scaleX(${1 + Math.abs(rotateY) * 0.02})`;                    
      4880 +                    }                                        
      4881 +                                                             
      4882 +                    if (bookLight) {                         
      4883 +                        const lightX = 50 + rotateY * 2;     
      4884 +                        const lightY = 50 - rotateX * 2;     
      4885 +                        bookLight.style.background =         
           +`radial-gradient(circle at ${lightX}% ${lightY}%,            
           +rgba(255,255,255,0.5) 0%, transparent 50%)`;                 
      4886 +                    }                                        
      4887 +                });                                          
      4888 +                                                             
      4889 +                document.addEventListener('mouseleave', ()   
           +=> {                                                         
      4890 +                    holoBook.style.transform = '';           
      4891 +                    holoBook.classList.remove('tracking');   
      4892 +                    holoBook.classList.add('floating');      
      4893 +                    if (bookShadow)                          
           +bookShadow.style.transform = '';                             
      4894 +                });                                          
      4895 +            }                                                
      4896 +                                                             
      4897 +            // Mobile: Gyroscope tracking                    
      4898 +            if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {                  
      4899 +                window.addEventListener('deviceorientation', 
           + (e) => {                                                    
      4900 +                    const beta = e.beta || 0;                
      4901 +                    const gamma = e.gamma || 0;              
      4902 +                                                             
      4903 +                    const rotateX = Math.max(-maxRotation,   
           +Math.min(maxRotation, (beta - 45) * 0.5));                   
      4904 +                    const rotateY = Math.max(-maxRotation,   
           +Math.min(maxRotation, gamma * 0.5));                         
      4905 +                                                             
      4906 +                    holoBook.style.transform =               
           +`rotateY(${rotateY}deg) rotateX(${rotateX}deg)`;             
      4907 +                    holoBook.classList.add('tracking');      
      4908 +                                                             
      4909 +                    if (bookShadow) {                        
      4910 +                        bookShadow.style.transform =         
           +`translateX(calc(-50% + ${rotateY * 2}px)) rotateX(90deg)`;  
      4911 +                    }                                        
      4912 +                }, { passive: true });                       
      4913 +            }                                                
      4914 +        }                                                    
      4915 +                                                             
      4916 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4917 +        // PHASE 12: PARTICLE TEXT DISSOLUTION               
      4918 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4919 +        function initDissolveText() {                        
      4920 +            const heroTitle =                                
           +document.getElementById('hero-title');                       
      4921 +            if (!heroTitle ||                                
           +heroTitle.classList.contains('dissolve-ready')) return;      
      4922 +                                                             
      4923 +            const text = heroTitle.textContent;              
      4924 +            heroTitle.innerHTML = '';                        
      4925 +            heroTitle.classList.add('dissolve-text',         
           +'dissolve-ready');                                           
      4926 +                                                             
      4927 +            [...text].forEach((char, i) => {                 
      4928 +                const span = document.createElement('span'); 
      4929 +                span.className = 'char';                     
      4930 +                span.textContent = char === ' ' ? '\u00A0' : 
           + char;                                                       
      4931 +                span.style.setProperty('--char-index', i);   
      4932 +                heroTitle.appendChild(span);                 
      4933 +            });                                              
      4934 +                                                             
      4935 +            const particlePool = [];                         
      4936 +            const poolSize = 50;                             
      4937 +                                                             
      4938 +            for (let i = 0; i < poolSize; i++) {             
      4939 +                const particle =                             
           +document.createElement('div');                               
      4940 +                particle.className = 'dissolve-particle';    
      4941 +                document.body.appendChild(particle);         
      4942 +                particlePool.push(particle);                 
      4943 +            }                                                
      4944 +                                                             
      4945 +            let dissolved = false;                           
      4946 +            let particleIndex = 0;                           
      4947 +                                                             
      4948 +            const dissolveThreshold = window.innerHeight *   
           +0.3;                                                         
      4949 +                                                             
      4950 +            const checkDissolve = () => {                    
      4951 +                const scrollY = window.scrollY;              
      4952 +                                                             
      4953 +                if (scrollY > dissolveThreshold &&           
           +!dissolved) {                                                
      4954 +                    dissolved = true;                        
      4955 +                    heroTitle.classList.add('dissolving');   
      4956 +                                                             
      4957 +                                                             
           +heroTitle.querySelectorAll('.char').forEach((char, i) => {   
      4958 +                        setTimeout(() => {                   
      4959 +                            const rect =                     
           +char.getBoundingClientRect();                                
      4960 +                            const particle =                 
           +particlePool[particleIndex % poolSize];                      
      4961 +                            particleIndex++;                 
      4962 +                                                             
      4963 +                            particle.style.left = rect.left  
           ++ rect.width / 2 + 'px';                                     
      4964 +                            particle.style.top = rect.top +  
           +rect.height / 2 + 'px';                                      
      4965 +                                                             
           +particle.style.setProperty('--tx', (Math.random() - 0.5) *   
           +200 + 'px');                                                 
      4966 +                                                             
           +particle.style.setProperty('--ty', -100 - Math.random() *    
           +100 + 'px');                                                 
      4967 +                            particle.style.animation =       
           +'particleFly 1s ease-out forwards';                          
      4968 +                                                             
      4969 +                            setTimeout(() => {               
      4970 +                                particle.style.animation =   
           +'';                                                          
      4971 +                            }, 1000);                        
      4972 +                        }, i * 20);                          
      4973 +                    });                                      
      4974 +                                                             
      4975 +                    if (typeof SonicArchitecture !==         
           +'undefined') {                                               
      4976 +                                                             
           +SonicArchitecture.playInteraction('milestone');              
      4977 +                    }                                        
      4978 +                                                             
      4979 +                } else if (scrollY <= dissolveThreshold *    
           +0.5 && dissolved) {                                          
      4980 +                    dissolved = false;                       
      4981 +                                                             
           +heroTitle.classList.remove('dissolving');                    
      4982 +                }                                            
      4983 +            };                                               
      4984 +                                                             
      4985 +            window.addEventListener('scroll', checkDissolve, 
           + { passive: true });                                         
      4986 +        }                                                    
      4987 +                                                             
      4988 +        if (document.readyState === 'complete') {            
      4989 +            initDissolveText();                              
      4990 +        } else {                                             
      4991 +            window.addEventListener('load',                  
           +initDissolveText);                                           
      4992 +        }                                                    
      4993 +                                                             
      4994 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4995 +        // PHASE 13: TIME-AWARE CONSCIOUSNESS                
      4996 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      4997 +        const TimeConsciousness = {                          
      4998 +            init() {                                         
      4999 +                this.update();                               
      5000 +                setInterval(() => this.update(), 5 * 60 *    
           +1000);                                                       
      5001 +            },                                               
      5002 +                                                             
      5003 +            update() {                                       
      5004 +                const hour = new Date().getHours();          
      5005 +                const root = document.documentElement;       
      5006 +                const body = document.body;                  
      5007 +                                                             
      5008 +                body.classList.remove('dawn-mode',           
           +'day-mode', 'dusk-mode', 'night-mode');                      
      5009 +                                                             
      5010 +                if (hour >= 5 && hour < 8) {                 
      5011 +                    body.classList.add('dawn-mode');         
      5012 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-hue-shift', '10deg');         
      5013 +                    root.style.setProperty('--time-warmth',  
           +'0.3');                                                      
      5014 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-brightness', '0.95');         
      5015 +                    console.log('ğŸŒ… Dawn mode activated');   
      5016 +                                                             
      5017 +                } else if (hour >= 8 && hour < 18) {         
      5018 +                    body.classList.add('day-mode');          
      5019 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-hue-shift', '0deg');          
      5020 +                    root.style.setProperty('--time-warmth',  
           +'0');                                                        
      5021 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-brightness', '1');            
      5022 +                    console.log('â˜€ï¸ Day mode activated');    
      5023 +                                                             
      5024 +                } else if (hour >= 18 && hour < 21) {        
      5025 +                    body.classList.add('dusk-mode');         
      5026 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-hue-shift', '15deg');         
      5027 +                    root.style.setProperty('--time-warmth',  
           +'0.4');                                                      
      5028 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-brightness', '0.9');          
      5029 +                    console.log('ğŸŒ† Dusk mode activated');   
      5030 +                                                             
      5031 +                } else {                                     
      5032 +                    body.classList.add('night-mode');        
      5033 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-hue-shift', '-5deg');         
      5034 +                    root.style.setProperty('--time-warmth',  
           +'0');                                                        
      5035 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-brightness', '0.85');         
      5036 +                                                             
           +root.style.setProperty('--time-saturation', '1.1');          
      5037 +                    console.log('ğŸŒ™ Night mode activated');  
      5038 +                }                                            
      5039 +            }                                                
      5040 +        };                                                   
      5041 +                                                             
      5042 +        TimeConsciousness.init();                            
      5043 +                                                             
      5044 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5045 +        // PHASE 14: NEURAL NETWORK VISUALIZER               
      5046 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5047 +        const neuralCanvas =                                 
           +document.getElementById('neural-canvas');                    
      5048 +                                                             
      5049 +        if (neuralCanvas) {                                  
      5050 +            const ctx = neuralCanvas.getContext('2d');       
      5051 +            const ideaCards =                                
           +document.querySelectorAll('.idea-card');                     
      5052 +            let nodes = [];                                  
      5053 +            let animationFrame;                              
      5054 +                                                             
      5055 +            function resizeNeuralCanvas() {                  
      5056 +                const section = neuralCanvas.parentElement;  
      5057 +                neuralCanvas.width = section.offsetWidth;    
      5058 +                neuralCanvas.height = section.offsetHeight;  
      5059 +                initNeuralNodes();                           
      5060 +            }                                                
      5061 +                                                             
      5062 +            function initNeuralNodes() {                     
      5063 +                nodes = [];                                  
      5064 +                const count = Math.min(ideaCards.length * 3, 
           + 30);                                                        
      5065 +                                                             
      5066 +                for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {            
      5067 +                    nodes.push({                             
      5068 +                        x: Math.random() *                   
           +neuralCanvas.width,                                          
      5069 +                        y: Math.random() *                   
           +neuralCanvas.height,                                         
      5070 +                        vx: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5,     
      5071 +                        vy: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 0.5,     
      5072 +                        radius: 2 + Math.random() * 3,       
      5073 +                        pulsePhase: Math.random() * Math.PI  
           +* 2,                                                         
      5074 +                        active: false                        
      5075 +                    });                                      
      5076 +                }                                            
      5077 +            }                                                
      5078 +                                                             
      5079 +            function drawNetwork() {                         
      5080 +                ctx.clearRect(0, 0, neuralCanvas.width,      
           +neuralCanvas.height);                                        
      5081 +                                                             
      5082 +                ctx.strokeStyle = 'rgba(212, 168, 75, 0.1)'; 
      5083 +                ctx.lineWidth = 1;                           
      5084 +                                                             
      5085 +                for (let i = 0; i < nodes.length; i++) {     
      5086 +                    for (let j = i + 1; j < nodes.length;    
           +j++) {                                                       
      5087 +                        const dx = nodes[j].x - nodes[i].x;  
      5088 +                        const dy = nodes[j].y - nodes[i].y;  
      5089 +                        const dist = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy  
           +* dy);                                                       
      5090 +                                                             
      5091 +                        if (dist < 150) {                    
      5092 +                            const opacity = (1 - dist / 150) 
           + * 0.3;                                                      
      5093 +                            ctx.strokeStyle = `rgba(212,     
           +168, 75, ${opacity})`;                                       
      5094 +                                                             
      5095 +                            ctx.beginPath();                 
      5096 +                            ctx.moveTo(nodes[i].x,           
           +nodes[i].y);                                                 
      5097 +                            ctx.lineTo(nodes[j].x,           
           +nodes[j].y);                                                 
      5098 +                            ctx.stroke();                    
      5099 +                        }                                    
      5100 +                    }                                        
      5101 +                }                                            
      5102 +                                                             
      5103 +                nodes.forEach((node, i) => {                 
      5104 +                    node.x += node.vx;                       
      5105 +                    node.y += node.vy;                       
      5106 +                                                             
      5107 +                    if (node.x < 0 || node.x >               
           +neuralCanvas.width) node.vx *= -1;                           
      5108 +                    if (node.y < 0 || node.y >               
           +neuralCanvas.height) node.vy *= -1;                          
      5109 +                                                             
      5110 +                    node.pulsePhase += 0.02;                 
      5111 +                    const pulse = 1 +                        
           +Math.sin(node.pulsePhase) * 0.3;                             
      5112 +                                                             
      5113 +                    ctx.beginPath();                         
      5114 +                    ctx.arc(node.x, node.y, node.radius *    
           +pulse, 0, Math.PI * 2);                                      
      5115 +                    ctx.fillStyle = node.active              
      5116 +                        ? 'rgba(244, 200, 86, 0.9)'          
      5117 +                        : 'rgba(212, 168, 75, 0.6)';         
      5118 +                    ctx.fill();                              
      5119 +                                                             
      5120 +                    if (node.active) {                       
      5121 +                        ctx.shadowColor = 'rgba(212, 168,    
           +75, 0.8)';                                                   
      5122 +                        ctx.shadowBlur = 15;                 
      5123 +                        ctx.fill();                          
      5124 +                        ctx.shadowBlur = 0;                  
      5125 +                    }                                        
      5126 +                });                                          
      5127 +                                                             
      5128 +                animationFrame =                             
           +requestAnimationFrame(drawNetwork);                          
      5129 +            }                                                
      5130 +                                                             
      5131 +            ideaCards.forEach((card, i) => {                 
      5132 +                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {  
      5133 +                    const rect =                             
           +card.getBoundingClientRect();                                
      5134 +                    const sectionRect =                      
           +neuralCanvas.getBoundingClientRect();                        
      5135 +                    const cardCenterX = rect.left -          
           +sectionRect.left + rect.width / 2;                           
      5136 +                    const cardCenterY = rect.top -           
           +sectionRect.top + rect.height / 2;                           
      5137 +                                                             
      5138 +                    nodes.forEach(node => {                  
      5139 +                        const dx = node.x - cardCenterX;     
      5140 +                        const dy = node.y - cardCenterY;     
      5141 +                        const dist = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy  
           +* dy);                                                       
      5142 +                        node.active = dist < 200;            
      5143 +                    });                                      
      5144 +                });                                          
      5145 +                                                             
      5146 +                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {  
      5147 +                    nodes.forEach(node => node.active =      
           +false);                                                      
      5148 +                });                                          
      5149 +            });                                              
      5150 +                                                             
      5151 +            resizeNeuralCanvas();                            
      5152 +            window.addEventListener('resize',                
           +resizeNeuralCanvas);                                         
      5153 +                                                             
      5154 +            const neuralObserver = new                       
           +IntersectionObserver((entries) => {                          
      5155 +                entries.forEach(entry => {                   
      5156 +                    if (entry.isIntersecting) {              
      5157 +                        drawNetwork();                       
      5158 +                    } else {                                 
      5159 +                                                             
           +cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrame);                        
      5160 +                    }                                        
      5161 +                });                                          
      5162 +            }, { threshold: 0.1 });                          
      5163 +                                                             
      5164 +                                                             
           +neuralObserver.observe(neuralCanvas.parentElement);          
      5165 +        }                                                    
      5166 +                                                             
      5167 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5168 +        // PHASE 15: CONSTELLATION PROGRESS                  
      5169 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5170 +        const constellationNav =                             
           +document.getElementById('constellation-nav');                
      5171 +                                                             
      5172 +        if (constellationNav) {                              
      5173 +            const sections = [                               
      5174 +                { id: 'hero', label: 'HOME' },               
      5175 +                { id: 'ideas', label: 'IDEAS' },             
      5176 +                { id: 'quotes', label: 'QUOTES' },           
      5177 +                { id: 'about', label: 'AUTHOR' },            
      5178 +                { id: 'reviews', label: 'REVIEWS' },         
      5179 +                { id: 'cta', label: 'GET BOOK' }             
      5180 +            ];                                               
      5181 +                                                             
      5182 +            let html = '';                                   
      5183 +            sections.forEach((section, i) => {               
      5184 +                const sectionEl =                            
           +document.getElementById(section.id) ||                       
      5185 +                                                             
           +document.querySelector(`.${section.id}-section`) ||          
      5186 +                                                             
           +document.querySelector(`[class*="${section.id}"]`);          
      5187 +                                                             
      5188 +                if (sectionEl) {                             
      5189 +                    html += `                                
      5190 +                        <div class="constellation-star"      
           +data-section="${section.id}">                                
      5191 +                            <span                            
           +class="constellation-label">${section.label}</span>          
      5192 +                        </div>                               
      5193 +                    `;                                       
      5194 +                    if (i < sections.length - 1) {           
      5195 +                        html += `<div                        
           +class="constellation-line" data-line="${i}"></div>`;         
      5196 +                    }                                        
      5197 +                }                                            
      5198 +            });                                              
      5199 +                                                             
      5200 +            constellationNav.innerHTML = html;               
      5201 +                                                             
      5202 +            constellationNav.querySelectorAll('.constellatio 
           +n-star').forEach(star => {                                   
      5203 +                star.addEventListener('click', () => {       
      5204 +                    const sectionId = star.dataset.section;  
      5205 +                    const target =                           
           +document.getElementById(sectionId) ||                        
      5206 +                                                             
           +document.querySelector(`.${sectionId}-section`) ||           
      5207 +                                                             
           +document.querySelector(`[class*="${sectionId}"]`);           
      5208 +                                                             
      5209 +                    if (target) {                            
      5210 +                        if (lenis) {                         
      5211 +                            lenis.scrollTo(target, { offset: 
           + -50 });                                                     
      5212 +                        } else {                             
      5213 +                            target.scrollIntoView({          
           +behavior: 'smooth' });                                       
      5214 +                        }                                    
      5215 +                    }                                        
      5216 +                });                                          
      5217 +            });                                              
      5218 +                                                             
      5219 +            const updateConstellation = () => {              
      5220 +                const windowHeight = window.innerHeight;     
      5221 +                const stars =                                
           +constellationNav.querySelectorAll('.constellation-star');    
      5222 +                const lines =                                
           +constellationNav.querySelectorAll('.constellation-line');    
      5223 +                                                             
      5224 +                sections.forEach((section, i) => {           
      5225 +                    const sectionEl =                        
           +document.getElementById(section.id) ||                       
      5226 +                                                             
           +document.querySelector(`.${section.id}-section`) ||          
      5227 +                                                             
           +document.querySelector(`[class*="${section.id}"]`);          
      5228 +                                                             
      5229 +                    if (sectionEl && stars[i]) {             
      5230 +                        const rect =                         
           +sectionEl.getBoundingClientRect();                           
      5231 +                        const isActive = rect.top <          
           +windowHeight * 0.5 && rect.bottom > windowHeight * 0.3;      
      5232 +                        const isPassed = rect.bottom <       
           +windowHeight * 0.5;                                          
      5233 +                                                             
      5234 +                        stars[i].classList.toggle('active',  
           +isActive || isPassed);                                       
      5235 +                                                             
      5236 +                        if (lines[i]) {                      
      5237 +                                                             
           +lines[i].classList.toggle('filled', isPassed);               
      5238 +                        }                                    
      5239 +                    }                                        
      5240 +                });                                          
      5241 +            };                                               
      5242 +                                                             
      5243 +            const showConstellation = () => {                
      5244 +                const show = window.scrollY >                
           +window.innerHeight * 0.5;                                    
      5245 +                constellationNav.classList.toggle('visible', 
           + show);                                                      
      5246 +            };                                               
      5247 +                                                             
      5248 +            window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {        
      5249 +                updateConstellation();                       
      5250 +                showConstellation();                         
      5251 +            }, { passive: true });                           
      5252 +                                                             
      5253 +            updateConstellation();                           
      5254 +        }                                                    
      5255 +                                                             
      5256 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5257 +        // PHASE 16: SENTIENT CURSOR                         
      5258 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5259 +        const cursorDot =                                    
           +document.getElementById('cursor-dot');                       
      5260 +        const cursorRing =                                   
           +document.getElementById('cursor-ring');                      
      5261 +                                                             
      5262 +        if (cursorDot && cursorRing &&                       
           +window.matchMedia('(pointer: fine)').matches) {              
      5263 +            let mouseX = 0, mouseY = 0;                      
      5264 +            let ringX = 0, ringY = 0;                        
      5265 +                                                             
      5266 +            document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {  
      5267 +                mouseX = e.clientX;                          
      5268 +                mouseY = e.clientY;                          
      5269 +                                                             
      5270 +                cursorDot.style.left = mouseX + 'px';        
      5271 +                cursorDot.style.top = mouseY + 'px';         
      5272 +            });                                              
      5273 +                                                             
      5274 +            function animateRing() {                         
      5275 +                ringX += (mouseX - ringX) * 0.15;            
      5276 +                ringY += (mouseY - ringY) * 0.15;            
      5277 +                                                             
      5278 +                cursorRing.style.left = ringX + 'px';        
      5279 +                cursorRing.style.top = ringY + 'px';         
      5280 +                                                             
      5281 +                requestAnimationFrame(animateRing);          
      5282 +            }                                                
      5283 +            animateRing();                                   
      5284 +                                                             
      5285 +            const hoverTargets = {                           
      5286 +                link: 'a, .nav-link',                        
      5287 +                button: 'button, .hero-cta, .cta-primary,    
           +.cta-secondary, .buy-btn, .cta-button',                      
      5288 +                text: 'p, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6'            
      5289 +            };                                               
      5290 +                                                             
      5291 +            Object.entries(hoverTargets).forEach(([type,     
           +selector]) => {                                              
      5292 +                                                             
           +document.querySelectorAll(selector).forEach(el => {          
      5293 +                    el.addEventListener('mouseenter', () =>  
           +{                                                            
      5294 +                                                             
           +cursorDot.classList.add(`hover-${type}`);                    
      5295 +                                                             
           +cursorRing.classList.add(`hover-${type}`);                   
      5296 +                    });                                      
      5297 +                    el.addEventListener('mouseleave', () =>  
           +{                                                            
      5298 +                                                             
           +cursorDot.classList.remove(`hover-${type}`);                 
      5299 +                                                             
           +cursorRing.classList.remove(`hover-${type}`);                
      5300 +                    });                                      
      5301 +                });                                          
      5302 +            });                                              
      5303 +                                                             
      5304 +            document.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {  
      5305 +                cursorDot.style.opacity = '0';               
      5306 +                cursorRing.style.opacity = '0';              
      5307 +            });                                              
      5308 +                                                             
      5309 +            document.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {  
      5310 +                cursorDot.style.opacity = '1';               
      5311 +                cursorRing.style.opacity = '1';              
      5312 +            });                                              
      5313 +        }                                                    
      5314 +                                                             
      5315 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5316 +        // PHASE 17: QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT PARTICLES          
      5317 +        // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• 
           +â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•                                       
      5318 +        const QuantumField = {                               
      5319 +            pairs: [],                                       
      5320 +                                                             
      5321 +            init() {                                         
      5322 +                for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {                
      5323 +                    this.createPair();                       
      5324 +                }                                            
      5325 +                this.animate();                              
      5326 +            },                                               
      5327 +                                                             
      5328 +            createPair() {                                   
      5329 +                const particleA =                            
           +document.createElement('div');                               
      5330 +                particleA.className = 'quantum-particle      
           +entangled';                                                  
      5331 +                document.body.appendChild(particleA);        
      5332 +                                                             
      5333 +                const particleB =                            
           +document.createElement('div');                               
      5334 +                particleB.className = 'quantum-particle      
           +entangled';                                                  
      5335 +                particleB.style.animationDelay = '0s';       
      5336 +                document.body.appendChild(particleB);        
      5337 +                                                             
      5338 +                const line = document.createElement('div');  
      5339 +                line.className = 'quantum-line';             
      5340 +                document.body.appendChild(line);             
      5341 +                                                             
      5342 +                const pair = {                               
      5343 +                    a: {                                     
      5344 +                        el: particleA,                       
      5345 +                        x: Math.random() * window.innerWidth 
           + * 0.4,                                                      
      5346 +                        y: Math.random() *                   
           +window.innerHeight,                                          
      5347 +                        vx: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 2,       
      5348 +                        vy: (Math.random() - 0.5) * 2        
      5349 +                    },                                       
      5350 +                    b: {                                     
      5351 +                        el: particleB,                       
      5352 +                        x: 0,                                
      5353 +                        y: 0                                 
      5354 +                    },                                       
      5355 +                    line: line                               
      5356 +                };                                           
      5357 +                                                             
      5358 +                this.pairs.push(pair);                       
      5359 +            },                                               
      5360 +                                                             
      5361 +            animate() {                                      
      5362 +                this.pairs.forEach(pair => {                 
      5363 +                    pair.a.x += pair.a.vx;                   
      5364 +                    pair.a.y += pair.a.vy;                   
      5365 +                                                             
      5366 +                    if (pair.a.x < 0 || pair.a.x >           
           +window.innerWidth * 0.4) pair.a.vx *= -1;                    
      5367 +                    if (pair.a.y < 0 || pair.a.y >           
           +window.innerHeight) pair.a.vy *= -1;                         
      5368 +                                                             
      5369 +                    pair.b.x = window.innerWidth - pair.a.x; 
      5370 +                    pair.b.y = pair.a.y;                     
      5371 +                                                             
      5372 +                    pair.a.el.style.left = pair.a.x + 'px';  
      5373 +                    pair.a.el.style.top = pair.a.y + 'px';   
      5374 +                    pair.b.el.style.left = pair.b.x + 'px';  
      5375 +                    pair.b.el.style.top = pair.b.y + 'px';   
      5376 +                                                             
      5377 +                    const dx = pair.b.x - pair.a.x;          
      5378 +                    const dy = pair.b.y - pair.a.y;          
      5379 +                    const length = Math.sqrt(dx * dx + dy *  
           +dy);                                                         
      5380 +                    const angle = Math.atan2(dy, dx) * 180 / 
           + Math.PI;                                                    
      5381 +                                                             
      5382 +                    pair.line.style.left = pair.a.x + 'px';  
      5383 +                    pair.line.style.top = pair.a.y + 'px';   
      5384 +                    pair.line.style.width = length + 'px';   
      5385 +                    pair.line.style.transform =              
           +`rotate(${angle}deg)`;                                       
      5386 +                });                                          
      5387 +                                                             
      5388 +                requestAnimationFrame(() => this.animate()); 
      5389 +            }                                                
      5390 +        };                                                   
      5391 +                                                             
      5392 +        // Initialize quantum field (desktop only)           
      5393 +        if (window.innerWidth > 768) {                       
      5394 +            setTimeout(() => QuantumField.init(), 2000);     
      5395 +        }                                                    
      5396 +                                                             
      5397 +        console.log('ğŸš€ Future Tier Enhancements Phases 8-17 
           + loaded');                                                   
      5398 +                                                             
      5399      })();                                                    
      5400      </script>                                                
      5401

âº All Future Tier enhancements (Phases 8-17) are now live!

  Deployed to: https://infinite-architects-ultimate-websit.vercel.app

  Local testing: http://localhost:3000/

  Summary of Implemented Features:

  | Phase | Feature                | Status                                                                             |
  |-------|------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
  | 8     | Cinematic Portal       | Animated particle fallback (video excluded due to 114MB size > Vercel 100MB limit) |
  | 9     | Liquid Reality Scroll  | Lenis smooth scrolling with physics-based momentum                                 |
  | 10    | Sonic Architecture     | Tone.js ambient soundscape with toggle button                                      |
  | 11    | Holographic Book       | 3D book with mouse/gyroscope tracking + dynamic lighting                           |
  | 12    | Particle Dissolution   | Title dissolves into particles on scroll                                           |
  | 13    | Time Consciousness     | Site adapts to time of day (dawn/day/dusk/night + stars at night)                  |
  | 14    | Neural Network         | Animated neural nodes behind Ideas section                                         |
  | 15    | Constellation Progress | Star-based scroll navigation on the right                                          |
  | 16    | Sentient Cursor        | Custom cursor that morphs on hover (desktop only)                                  |
  | 17    | Quantum Entanglement   | Mirrored particle pairs (desktop only)                                             |

  Note about the video: The video file is 114MB which exceeds Vercel's 100MB limit and isn't practical for web use. The CTA section now uses an animated particle effect as a fallback which is much lighter and works smoothly. If you want to use video in the future, you'd need to compress it to under 5MB (ideally using ffmpeg) or host it on a video CDN.

      3328 +                                                             
      3329 +            get isSlowConnection() {

      3389              inOutSine: t => -(Math.cos(Math.PI * t) - 1) / 2 
      3390          };                                                   
      3391                                                               
      3392 +        // Throttle utility for scroll handlers              
      3393 +        const throttle = (fn, wait) => {                     
      3394 +            let last = 0;                                    
      3395 +            return function(...args) {                       
      3396 +                const now = Date.now();                      
      3397 +                if (now - last >= wait) {                    
      3398 +                    last = now;                              
      3399 +                    fn.apply(this, args);                    
      3400 +                }                                            
      3401 +            };                                               
      3402 +        };                                                   
      3403 +                                                             
      3404          // â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
